result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 21CT60, 22CF49, 22CF73, 22CF74.  9:21 AM  Defendant Christopher Michael Johanson appeared by video from treatment center. Attorney Donna Burger in court for Christopher Michael Johanson. CASES: 22CF49, 22CF73, 22CF74, 21CT60. 10:32 AM Defendant Christopher Michael Johanson not in court or by Zoom.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Christopher Michael Johanson.  Attorney David Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. CT reviews telephone call from defendant to JA. Zoom information was provided to def. Def does not appear on zoom. Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.

CASES: ARGN in 22CF73 & 22CF74, STC in 21CT60 & 22CF49. 10:24 am. JL-Clerk. Defendant Christopher Michael Johanson in court with attorney Donna Burger. P Attorney David Stilin in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin. Reading waived, plea NG. Defense is preserved 15 days on prearraignment rights. State makes request for Def to complete UA prior to leaving subject to bond conditions and reports received from another agency.  Atty Burger objects. CT does not find reasonable suspicion in courtroom, will not order Def to be tested today. Bonds cont. 10:34 am adj.

CASES: PH in 22CF49, 22CF73 & 22CF74, SC in 21CT60. Defendant Christopher Michael Johanson in court with attorney Donna Burger.  David Stilin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 10:43 a.m. AO-Clerk. 

22CF49 - ADA Stilin calls TRebhan, S&T. Ct - identification made. Ct - does not bind over on Count 1, Count 1 dismissed. Atty Burger - plea NG to all other counts.

22CF74 - ADA Stilin calls TRebhan. TRebhan testifies. Ct takes JN of Doc 4 in 22CF49 & Document 8 in 21CT60. Ct - identification made, venue established, finds PC, de bound over. 

22CF73 - ADA Stilin calls DPosey, S&T. Ct takes JN of bonds in 22CF49 and 21CT60. Ct - identification made, venue established, finds PC, de bound over. 

Bonds continue. 11:13 a.m. adj.  Status conference scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
